description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. JewellCity is open for business and you are the mayor. Use the tiles to build a thriving city but be warned: Line up three tiles in a row and watch it all come crashing down!
description.short: JewellCity is open for business and you are the mayor. Use the tiles to build a thriving city but be warned: Line up three tiles in a row and watch it all come crashing down!
